abstract_ssm: These records include documents of the Board of Trustees, and minutes of meetings of the Third Presbyterian Church and its congregation. The records span the period 1838 to 1857 and are housed in a single bound volume.
subject_ssm: Presbyterian Church |z New York (State) |z Kings County

subject_sim: Presbyterian Church -- New York (State) -- Kings County
